channel.title: Iain Thomas on Infinite Walk
channel.description: Recent content in Iain Thomas on Infinite Walk

item.title: Hate Feeds The Hate
item.description: This one spots to the division and non-symmetry we have in our society as this point. We need to remind ourselves that we are all one and we need to love each other. Have we forgotten the rules of our existence today? Download this poem as image, text, or pdf.
